name: Option 16 - The Game
description:
A game based off of the 2013-2014 First Tech Challenge robotics competition game and the robot made by Team 5555, Option 16. The game was shown at the World Championships where it was praised by competitors and judges.

Compete to earn high scores!

Credits:

Programming, Models, Game Design: Adam V.
General Help: Team 5555, Option 16
